update bulletin_board set announce_date = #{announceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_data = #{contentData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, ANNOUNCE_DATE, SUBJECT from BULLETIN_BOARD where ENABLE = 'Y'

select ID, ANNOUNCE_DATE, SUBJECT from BULLETIN_BOARD
SUBJECT like '%' || #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
